effect.scarlet_violet: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.the_teal_mask: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.
effect.legends_za: Resets the target’s evasion to normal and prevents any further boosting until the target leaves the field. A ghost under this effect takes normal damage from normal and fighting moves. This move itself ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
short_effect.legends_za: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.
